title: The Art of Cinematography with Brett Arndt
description: Brett Arndt joins Joshua Jean-Marie and Ben Terry to discuss what it means to be a director of photography and the art of cinematography. Brett is a rising cinematographer who has worked with artists like Post Malone, Lil Dirk, Cole Bennett of Lyrical Lemonade, and more.
dc:creator: How You Create
